description: Creation of roof terrace to rear outrigger with glazed balustrade
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): 34_EX_00_P1_AS EXISTING GROUND FLOOR; 34_EX_01_P1_AS EXISTING FIRST FLOOR ; 34_EX_02_P1_AS EXISTING SECOND FLOOR; 34_EX_03_P1_AS EXISTING ROOF; 34_EX_04_P1_AS EXISTING WEST ELEVATION; 34_EX_05_P1_AS EXISTING EAST ELEVATION; 34_EX_06_P1_AS EXISTING NORTH ELEVATION; 34_EX_07_P1_AS EXISTING SOUTH ELEVATION; 34_PL_00_P1_AS PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR; 34_PL_01_P1_AS PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR; 34_PL_02_P1_AS PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR; 34_PL_03_P1_AS PROPOSED ROOF; 34_PL_04_P1_AS PROPOSED WEST ELEVATION; 34_PL_05_P1_AS PROPOSED EAST ELEVATION; 34_PL_06_P1_AS PROPOSED NORTH ELEVATION; 34_PL_07_P1_AS PROPOSED SOUTH ELEVATION; 34_SP_03_P1_DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
